Package opennlp.ccg.perceptron

Interface Summary
FeatureExtractor Interface for mappings signs to features.
FeatureVector A sparse feature vector, with size and an iterator over feature-value pairs.
FeatureVector.Iterator Iterator over feature-value pairs.
Model.FeatureFilter Filter interface for adjusting feature weights when loading a model.
 

Class Summary
Alphabet A bidirectional mapping between feature names and indices.
Alphabet.Feature Feature as a node in a trie, with each node storing the feature index.
ComposedFeatureExtractor Class for composing feature extractors.
ComposedFeatureVector Class for composing feature vectors.
EventFile An abstract representation of an event file, whose syntax is a more readable version of what's used in the TADM toolkit.
EventFile.Block A block is a list of events.
EventFile.Event An event is a feature vector with a count.
FeatureList A feature vector represented by a list of features and a list of values.
FeatureMap A feature vector represented using a map.
Model A model is a vector of weights for an alphabet.
PerceptronScorer A sign scorer for a perceptron model.
ReRankingPerceptronScorer A re-ranking sign scorer for a perceptron model.
Trainer Trains an averaged perceptron model by iterating through an event file.
